detectors.description:
YstarFarmingPoolReward.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YstarFarmingPoolReward__4.sol#722-738) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YstarFarmingPoolReward__4.sol#728)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YstarFarmingPoolReward__4.sol#731)
